testsuite.name: Empty Database GET and POST route on book

testcase.name: Empty Database GET and POST route on book GET route expect code 200, expect return a 0 lenght array
testcase.classname: GET route expect code 200, expect return a 0 lenght array

testcase.name: Empty Database GET and POST route on book Post route expect code 200, and showing in message key on body "book successfully added"
testcase.classname: Post route expect code 200, and showing in message key on body "book successfully added"

testcase.name: Mocked database Put route expect code 200, and showing in message key on body "book successfully updated"
testcase.classname: Put route expect code 200, and showing in message key on body "book successfully updated"

testcase.name: Mocked database Delete route expect code 200, and showing in message key on body "book successfully deleted"
testcase.classname: Delete route expect code 200, and showing in message key on body "book successfully deleted"

testcase.name: Mocked database get route expect code 200, and showing in message key on body "book fetched" ...
testcase.classname: get route expect code 200, and showing in message key on body "book fetched" ...

testcase.name: Simulate answer get route expect code 200, and books object is an array
testcase.classname: get route expect code 200, and books object is an array

testcase.name: Simulate answer post route expect code 200, and message is " book successfully added"
testcase.classname: post route expect code 200, and message is " book successfully added"

testcase.name: Simulate answer post route expect code 200, and message is " book successfully added"
testcase.classname: post route expect code 200, and message is " book successfully added"

testcase.name: Simulate answer delete route expect code 200 and send an message"book successfully deleted"
testcase.classname: delete route expect code 200 and send an message"book successfully deleted"

testcase.name: Simulate bad answer route get books expect 400 and send an message "error fetching book"
testcase.classname: route get books expect 400 and send an message "error fetching book"

testcase.name: Simulate bad answer post route expect http code 400 and send an message "error adding the book"
testcase.classname: post route expect http code 400 and send an message "error adding the book"

testcase.name: Simulate bad answer put route expect status 400 and send an message"error updating the book"
testcase.classname: put route expect status 400 and send an message"error updating the book"

testcase.name: Simulate bad answer delete route expect status 400 and send an message"error deleting the book"
testcase.classname: delete route expect status 400 and send an message"error deleting the book"
